description: Configure rule based relationship worker settings.
documentation: The rule based relationship worker runs every configured time period and establishes configured relationships between entities based on their properties

maxNewRelationshipsPerRule.description: Maximum number of new relationships created for one entity per rule
maxNewRelationshipsPerRule.displayName: Maximum new relationships per entity and rule

partitionSize.description: Size of the partition, which defines how many entities are handled at once

resultLimit.description: Query limit for the number of entities which are considered

runInterval.description: Time in between worker runs (in minutes)

timeframe.description: Timeframe (in minutes) to look back to. Only entities which are last seen in this timeframe are considered
